properties.headline: Flood Warning issued January 12 at 7:38AM EST until January 12 at 8:21PM EST by NWS Morristown TN
properties.description:
...The National Weather Service in Morristown, TN has issued a Flood
Warning for the following rivers ...

Pigeon River At Newport TN affecting Cocke County

Rains have moved out of the area, but rivers continue to rise was waters
collect in drainage basins.  The Pigeon River is expected to rise above
flood stage today.

The National Weather Service in Morristown, TN has issued a
* Flood Warning for
The Pigeon River At Newport TN.
* From this morning until this evening.
* At 07:00 AM Sunday the stage was 6.8 feet and rising.
* Flood stage is 8.0 feet.
* Minor flooding is forecast.
* Forecast...Rise above flood stage by late this morning and continue
to rise to near 8.5 feet this afternoon. The river will fall
back below flood stage later this afternoon.
* At 8.0 feet...Minor flooding occurs downstream from gage on Highway
25/70 and in the community of Edwina. Jimtown Road may be affected.
properties.instruction:
Most deaths in floods occur in automobiles. If you come to a closed
or flooded road, Turn Around! Don't Drown! For more details, stay
tuned to NOAA Weather Radio or commercial television or radio
stations that carry weather information.
